text: @realDonaldTrump Well, this does not surprise me two “leaders” meet during a #COVID19 Pandemic without any taking precautions right when the WH stopped checking peoples’ temperature before they enter & when you stop Government funding for #COVID19 test centers in the hardest hit areas! #COVIDIOTS https://t.co/IxJyrRMCF9
